DOC.brief_title: A Study Asses Effect MK0663 Treatment Patients With Postoperative Dental Pain ( 0663-092 )
DOC.criteria: Patients must schedule 2 third molar remove , least 1 partially embed bone impact low jaw Patients must experience moderate severe pain follow dental procedure Previous molar extraction within past 45 day Personal family history inherit bleed disorder Uncontrolled high blood pressure
